§ Lupa Varka

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Lupa V⁠arka** is one of the [[world-18-characters]].

§§ World 18

[[world-18]], usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation influenced by //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記) that featured the character [[son-wu-kong]] (孫悟空), as well as influenced by ancient Egyptian mythology, and Persian mythology.

§§ About

**Lupa Varka** lives in the village of [[seyawt]] on planet [[kemeta]].

**Lupa Varka** is the daughter of [[gorg-⁠varka]].

And is the adopted sister of [[zoon]] adopted **Lupa** acts more like a mother-figure to [[zoon]].

The **Grand Master** [[jangshah]] (who she trains with) is her //maternal grandfather//.

The village of [[seduat]], that she lives in, has a long history of revering, exalting, and even worshipping [[upuat]].
But her family also has a historical connection with the deity [[upuat]] — and her family is considered a holy blood-line.
